description: Merchant guild theft enforcement: add a new Guard monster, shop debt payment across depths, and a theft alarm that can spawn/pursue guards until you pay your bill.
summary: New EntityKind::Guard (merchant guild enforcer) and sprite support.
Shop theft alarm refactored to a shared helper; stealing/attacking shopkeepers can now spawn guards.
Merchant guild pursuit: guards may appear on later floors if you flee with unpaid goods.
Shop debts can be paid across depths; clearing all debt makes guards stand down globally (current + stored levels).
Save format bumped to v42 to persist merchant guild pursuit state.
